subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Unbeaten Stanford, led by the Heisman candidate Andrew Luck, has joined L.S.U., Alabama and Oklahoma State in the thick of the Bowl Championship Series conversation.
snippet: Unbeaten Stanford, led by the Heisman candidate Andrew Luck, has joined L.S.U., Alabama and Oklahoma State in the thick of the Bowl Championship Series conversation.
